import React, {useEffect} from 'react'; import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { Table } from "react-bootstrap"; export const Final = () => { const basket = useSelector((state) =>state.basket); const price = useSelector((state) =>state.price); return (
{basket .map((item, index) => ( ))}
# name price QTY
{index + 1} {item.name} {item.price} $

QTY: {item.qty}
Total price is {price} $
) }
